text: Bill Irwin (born April 11, 1950) is an American stand-up comedian, actor and voice artist. He is best known for his work as Mr. Noodle in Sesame Street. He also appeared in the television series Northern Exposure and the M. Night Shyamalan movie Lady in the Water. ==Other websites== * Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Santa Monica, California Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American stand-up comedians Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from Los Angeles County, California
title: Bill Irwin
